title: Hfs Http file server
description:
What is it?

it&#039;s file sharing
it&#039;s webserver
it&#039;s open source
it&#039;s guaranteed to contain no malware

Features

# Download and upload
# Virtual file system
# Highly customizable
# HTML template
# Bandwidth control
# Easy/Expert mode
# Log
# Full control over connections
# Accounts
# Dynamic DNS updater

Description

You can use HFS (HTTP File Server) to send and receive files.

It&#039;s different from classic file sharing because it uses web technology to be more compatible with today&#039;s Internet.

It also differs from classic web servers because
it&#039;s very easy to use and runs "right out-of-the box".

Access your remote files, over the network.

It has been successfully tested with Wine under Linux.
